離開阿仙奴帥位的雲格，現在過得怎麼樣了？

　　在本週的歐洲足協教練研討會上，人們又看到了教授的身影，他和多名一線教頭一起，為足球運動的發展建言獻策。看起來，在告別了阿仙奴二十二年的風風雨雨之後，雲格依然對足球圈充滿留戀，即便賦閑在家，他其實也根本就閑不住。接下來，讓我們回顧一下雲格這個夏天以來一些公開活動的場景，也許能大致拚湊出，離開執教崗位後教授的生活是什麼樣子的。

　　參加慈善拍賣活動（2018年5月15日）

　　在離開阿仙奴帥位後僅僅一天，雲格就飛到法國，參加一場慈善拍賣。這一活動籌款的目的，是幫助那些因病入院的兒童與自己心目中的體育英雄見面，同時在學校和商業圈推廣對殘疾人慈善事業的關懷與幫助。

　　到土耳其渡假（2018年5月29日）

　　在足球圈打拚了二十多年後，雲格終於有時間徹底放鬆一下，他選擇了土耳其作為退下來之後的第一個渡假地。

　　在土耳其海岸城市保迪魯姆，有人拍到了雲格午餐的鏡頭，和他在一起的包括一些商界人士、法國歌星Jean Bearch，以及他在阿仙奴從前的同事大衛-德恩。

　　參加一場慈善比賽（2018年6月12日）

　　讓雲格長久的離開足球是很難的，這不，教授來趕場參加慈善賽，參賽雙方是法國98世界盃冠軍陣容和其他國家同時代的明星聯隊。

　　在現場觀眾們的掌聲中，雲格走上球場揮手致意，他還和伊度奧、亨利、迪西里等人合照留念。

　　世界盃評論嘉賓（2018年6月至7月）

　　一個對於足球如此瞭解的人，在世界盃期間是不可能閑著的。雲格出現在BeIN體育的嘉賓席，解說評論俄羅斯世界盃大賽。

　　在這裡，教授留下了一些引發媒體關注的言論，比如批評奧斯爾在德國隊的表現：「他踢得太謹慎了，有所保留。我在想，這不是我所瞭解的那個真正的奧斯爾，那個奧斯爾是可以殺死比賽的。」

　　敞開心扉的訪談（2018年7月17日）

　　在RTL的訪談中，雲格談了很多話題，並留下了很多精彩言論，比如下面這句：

　　「我是喜歡到處逛的人，但我也喜歡挑戰，在某些時候，我成為了自我挑戰的囚徒。」

　　造訪利比里亞（2018年8月23日至25日）

　　你曾經執教過的一球員，在幾十年後成為了他所在國家的總統，這事可不常發生，但雲格就遇到了。教授和法國昔日功勳教練居伊魯受邀訪問利比里亞，與總統喬治-韋亞見面。在那裡，雲格等受到了熱烈的歡迎，還獲得了國家級的榮譽勳章。

　　從1988年到1992年，年輕的韋亞在摩納哥效力過四年，期間得到了時任球隊教練雲格的悉心指導，可以說，韋亞職業生涯後來的輝煌，與教授最初的引路是分不開的。

　　到瑞士開會（2018年9月4日）

　　這是我們最近一次看到雲格，他和球壇多位著名教練一起，在瑞士尼翁的歐洲足協總部開會。在這裡，雲格碰到了昔日老冤家摩連奴，兩人是怎麼打招呼的，見面會聊些什麼，人們就不得而知了。

　　雲格會復出執教嗎？

　　雖然離開了阿仙奴帥位，但雲格從未宣稱自己退休，他依然有可能回歸教練崗位。不過在這個夏天，傳聞中皇馬和巴黎聖日耳門的帥位都已另有新主，而這段時間以來，也沒有與雲格相關的執教球隊傳聞。

　　也許，雲格需要休息一陣，並耐性等待，直到他最熟悉的英超中出現一個適合他的機會……

《兵情急報》槍手當兵表現如何？

國際賽期開始，現在為大家更新一下槍手們的表現：

。藍斯上半場尾段攻入一球，最終威爾斯4:1大勝愛爾蘭。原本入波好威威。。。點知下半場係自己禁區頂大意扭失波，被人搶到然後破蛋。。。但仍然都有7分以上嘅平均分
*藍斯的慶祝動作為表示太太肚內的twins

。米希達恩全場8射2中龍，原本可做贏波英雄，但69分鐘射失12碼，錯過再度領先機會。幸好阿美尼亞最後都能順利，以2:1贏列支敦仕登

。尼基迪亞獲提升，可跟大國腳一同操練

Revealed - The inside story of how Arsenal missed out on Manchester United legend Nemaja Vidic

Milosavljevic, who had a brief stint in England as a player for Chester, identified Vidic as a player that Arsenal should bring in but he has now revealed that the Gunners knocked back his reccomendation about the defender.

During an interview with the Chester Chronicle, Milosavljevic said: "I worked with Arsenal closely for 15 years when Arsene Wenger was there.

"Early on it took time to get people to trust you with players. I remember in 2005 with Nemanja Vidic when he was playing for Spartak Moscow. I told Arsenal that he is a quality player and someone that they should sign. I had known him since he had been playing for Red Star Belgrade.

"But they didn't trust my judgement on the player and nothing happened and he ended up signing for Manchester United a year later. He could have ended up playing for Arsenal if they would have trusted me on that one."

The 7 Arsenal youngsters Unai Emery has invited to join first-team training

With so many players away on international duty during the next fortnight, Unai Emery has called up several of the club’s youngsters to make up the numbers with the Arsenal senior squad at London Colney.

The international break always hands some of the young talent at Arsenal the opportunity to rub shoulders with the senior stars during training and this one is no different, with seven of the Under-23s squad joining in Wednesday’s session with the likes of Mesut Ozil, Hector Bellerin and Alexandre Lacazette.

One of those was Gedion Zelalem, who is still battling back to full fitness following an agonising 16 months out of the game due to injury.

Emile Smith Rowe, who made such an impact during pre-season, was also involved, as were Tolaji Bola, Julio Pleguezuelo, Nathan Tormey, Robbie Burton and Charlie Gilmour.

replies.msg: 成大事者不拘小節

Arsenal need to build around Lacazette – Keown

Former Arsenal defender Keown told the Daily Mail: “I think special mention has to go to Alexandre Lacazette.

“How patient has that man been? His attitude has been impeccable.

“He failed to make the French squad for the World Cup then watched from afar as they went on to lift the trophy in Russia.

“Emery used him as a substitute in his first three Premier League matches, then he finally gets to start against Cardiff.

“So what does he do? He goes and scores the winner. Lacazette now has to play and be the person they build around. Full credit to him.”

Keown added: “Emery now has his chance to reflect during the international break. This is a period of calm for the new head coach.

“If I was in his staff, I’d be saying we need to consider making a change to the system.

“Arsenal’s centre-backs Shkodran Mustafi and Sokratis aren’t really the best in possession of the ball.

“Emery has very creative players who play further up the pitch but he needs a figure who can sit in deep midfield. Lucas Torreira could be that man and he could then help the back two out.

“It can sometimes feel like we’re watching a youth team whose players are trying to be developed into passers. Manchester City play 4-1-2-3, with a deep midfielder and two creative players either side. That may be the way for Emery to go.”

Per Mertesacker: Ex-Arsenal captain 'relieved' not to play in final year at club


Ex-Arsenal captain Per Mertesacker says he felt "relieved" when he was not selected in his final year as a player because he was "struggling mentally".

Mertesacker, part of Germany's 2014 World Cup-winning squad, retired at the end of the 2017-18 season.

The 33-year-old told the Victoria Derbyshire show he felt "great" ending his 15-year professional career.

"Especially in my last year, I felt something and felt the pressure and it was very awkward sometimes," he said.

"I was happy about not necessarily playing, just training was enough for me."

香港足球代表隊新任教練韋特尚未正式上任，足總董事梁芷珊晚上在其社交平台貼文，計劃以行動以示不滿，並聲言：「如果件事真係可以咁發生，佢上任，我辭職。」

現年44歲的英籍教練韋特剛與足總傾妥出任港隊主教練，將於下周一上任，不過，足總董事梁芷珊似乎不滿足總聘韋特為帥，今晚在其社交平台貼文：「如果件事真係可以咁發生，佢上任，我辭職！」

她相隔十多分鐘後再貼文：「如果有人隻手遮天到呢個程度，都可以過到關，呢個足總實在令我太失望，如果佢上任，我辭職，理由係，這個機構太離譜，無得救！我會將呢個理由，寫埋係辭職信裏面。」

她還公開要求網民代寫辭職信：「有無人可以幫我寫封辭職信，我而家覺得，花多3分鐘去處理呢個機構嘅事，都太浪費我人生！」

Gilberto - The biggest thing I miss about Arsenal

Gilberto cannot wait to pull on the Arsenal shirt again this Saturday when our legends side face Real Madrid at Emirates Stadium.

"It’s always nice to be back at the Arsenal, it doesn’t matter the circumstances, I really enjoy still being connected with Arsenal," Gilberto told Arsenal Player.

"It’s a great feeling and I feel home and very comfortable to come back. Although things have changed with players and some of the people that have joined the club, for me these are not the main points, the point is the great atmosphere.

"To have the opportunity to see ex-teammates is always fun and always a great feeling, because you start to have a nice conversation and go back in time a little and have some fun.

"Of course, [the camerarderie] is one thing that I really miss. You wake up in the morning and go for a training session with the group and this is one thing that I miss.

"But you have to understand that everything has change and in the beginning it’s quite hard to adapt to it, but then you start to do some other things and it won’t be the same. It will never be the same, but you fill your time and you spend time doing other things and challenge yourself all the time.

"For me now for example, this course programme is a big challenge. After such a long time I’ve gone back to school for education to challenge myself for things. I’ve never had this experience before, but it’s been good and it’s all about how much we enjoy these things."


https://www.arsenal.com/news/gilberto-biggest-thing-i-miss-about-arsenal

Nketiah called up to make up the numbers in England first-team training

Nketiah stepped up from the England u20s squad to train with the first-team on Thursday, along with Marcus Tavernier of Middlesbrough.

England have had a couple of injury problems since selecting the squad for the international break, with Raheem Sterling and Adam Lallana withdrawing with injury. Gareth Southgate decided against calling up replacements, instead choosing to simply work with the 18 players still available.

To make up the numbers in training, Southgate’s instead drawn on the England youth teams. Liverpool’s Dominic Solanke joined the team earlier in the week, and Arsenal’s Nketiah was chosen along with Tavernier on Thursday.

http://dailycannon.com/2018/09/nketiah-called-up-to-make-up-the-numbers-in-england-first-team-training/

勁！比利連自家縫褲著做潮人


【now.com體育】阿仙奴後衛比利連除了球技了得外，原來縫紉亦有一手，他在其母親的指導下，用衣車縫製了一條褲給自己穿著，是時裝界的潮人。

比利連（Hector Bellerin）在社交網絡instagram分享了一段短片，展示了自己足球以外的另一才華，片段中，他竟坐在一部衣車面前忙於車衣，原來該名阿仙奴後衛在母親Maty Moruno的指導下，正為自己縫製一條長褲，儘管手藝看來仍有點生疏，但已帶來驚喜。

比利連其後亦在IG展示了他的製成品，那是一條絲質的長褲，黃色底色配上啡色的圓形圖案，看起來甚具中國風，他坐在木箱上chok爆拍照，一看就知他對時裝滿有要求。他過去亦曾多次在自己的社交平台分享最新服裝和潮流的圖片，絕對是時裝界潮人。

23歲的比利連受到兵工廠主帥艾美利重用，於球隊本季的4場英超比賽均正選上陣，估計下周六國際賽期過後首場對紐卡素的比賽，他仍會正選落場。

圖片來源 : Instagram圖片

VfL Wolfsburg has parted with Kaylen Hinds. The club has reacted to the forward's unauthorised absence of several weeks by terminating his contract with immediate effect. There is no longer a valid contract of employment between Hinds and VfL. "Despite repeated requests, he has not fulfilled his contractual obligations," said Jörg Schmadtke, VfL managing director for sport. "We do not tolerate such behaviour."

Hinds joined Wolfsburg from Arsenal last year. He made one Bundesliga appearance and one DFB Cup appearance for the club and was on loan at second-division side SpVgg Greuther Fürth between January and June 2018.

replies.msg: 偶像

卡索拉恐怖回億：腳踭唔見咗10cm肉


【now.com體育】前阿仙奴中場辛迪卡索拉，今季終於走出傷患噩夢在維拉利爾再上征途，但提起之前的經歷猶有餘悸。

「做手術時受到細菌感染，令傷口一直不埋口。踩健身單身時，傷口的聯針會鬆開。傷口不能癒合，令其他細菌有機可乘，晚上會流出黃色的膿。聯完針又再次鬆開，膿愈流愈多。」2016/17年季初右腳跟腱受傷後動過8次手術、上兩季合共養傷636天的辛迪卡索拉（Santi Cazorla）回憶這段恐怖經歷。

「細菌繼續肆虐，吃掉我跟腱的肉，需要植皮，但最後都檢驗不出是甚麼細菌。醫生告訴我，我跟腱的肉被細菌吃掉足足10厘米。」卡索拉續說。

33歲的卡索拉，今夏約滿後離開兵工廠，回到曾兩度效力的維拉利爾跟操，憑表現換來1年合約，至今已為黃色潛艇上陣3場。

Arsenal, Bellerin: "I'm a target of online insults, including homophobic ones."

Being famous, and also being on social media, can have as many challenging aspects as easy ones. Often you're the subject of insults from fellow social media users, who feel empowered on the device that they hide behind. Hector Bellerin is the latest to denounce this type of behavior.

The Arsenal fullback spoke to the Times on this side of sports, as well as the new season under manager Emery. "If you act in a way different than how people expect you to, you become a target and this is dangerous. For a little while, I had deleted my apps, but then I returned to social media and every day I learn how to live with this kind of abuse."

"In life," Bellerin continued, "you should feel free to express yourself. However, some insults are truly very bothersome -- the majority happen online, but it also happens in the stadium. Some people have called me a lesbian because of how I have long hair. But there are also homophobic insults. By now I am used to them, but they can make you feel bad and doubt yourself at the same time."

Luckily, in a sense, Bellerin has an escape in the pitch. He spoke on this season with the Gunners: "Now it's all new, even the staff. I am sorry for those who had left, and I thank them. The differences between Emery and Wenger? The last one wanted us to always play in the same way, regardless of our opponent, thinking that we could beat anyone anyway. Emery, on the other hand, looks for a new strategy to beat each opponent."

Arsenal's forgotten youngster makes return to first-team training after 16 months out injured

Arsenal's forgotten wonderkid Gedion Zelalem has finally returned to training after 16 months out injured.

Germany-born United States youth international Zelalem was branded the next Cesc Fabregas after he broke onto the scene as an exciting 16-year-old - sparkling during the Gunners' 2013 tour to Asia.


But the midfielder tore his cruciate ligament while at the 2017 FIFA Under-20 World Cup in South Korea in May 2017.

Zelalem has since attempted to rehabilitate his right knee and saw his original nine month timetable to recovery pushed back until now.

The 21-year-old has now finally recovered enough to take part in session with the first team and is attempting to catch new boss Unai Emery's eye, as reported by Football.London.

Here’s a look at which players have been making an impact at which levels.

U20s

Midfielder Joe Willock and winger Reiss Nelson both featured as England U20s beat Switzerland 2-0.

Willock produced an encouraging performance while Nelson, who is spending the season on loan at Hoffenheim, also caught the eye.

Eddie Nketiah was an unused substitute but the striker was selected to train with Gareth Southgate’s senior squad this week as he gained valuable experience.

U19s

Emile Smith Rowe was initially called up to the England U19 squad, but Arsenal, under the instructions of Unai Emery, chose for the midfielder to be withdrawn so that he could instead train with the first-team at London Colney.

Arsenal's forgotten youngster makes return to first-team training after 16 months out injured

Arsenal's forgotten wonderkid Gedion Zelalem has finally returned to training after 16 months out injured.

Germany-born United States youth international Zelalem was branded the next Cesc Fabregas after he broke onto the scene as an exciting 16-year-old - sparkling during the Gunners' 2013 tour to Asia.


But the midfielder tore his cruciate ligament while at the 2017 FIFA Under-20 World Cup in South Korea in May 2017.

Zelalem has since attempted to rehabilitate his right knee and saw his original nine month timetable to recovery pushed back until now.

The 21-year-old has now finally recovered enough to take part in session with the first team and is attempting to catch new boss Unai Emery's eye, as reported by Football.London.

槍手反擊:我們沒錯

據《每日電訊報》報導，在卡素拿因為傷勢恢復情況指責阿仙奴所犯的錯誤之後，阿仙奴方面發布聲明澄清，並為俱樂部在卡蘇拿傷情診治方面的工作進行辯護。

今年夏天，卡素拿離開阿仙奴重新回到維拉利爾，他一度擔心右腿會因為細菌感染被迫截肢，而跟腱和腳踝已經嚴重受損。

在最近的一次採訪中，卡素拿說他的腳踝上的骨頭已經有點像橡皮泥，醫生說甚至可以把手指插進去。這位33歲的老將表示，英國的醫生們應該對他的傷病負責，因為細菌感染並沒有得到妥善治療。



卡素拿在接受《衛報》採訪時說道：“ 有些人可能沒採取正確的處理方式，也許我不必經歷這些傷病。我本應該決定治療的地點和主治醫生，但事實並非如此，我應該早點回西班牙治療。 ”

而對於卡素拿的言論，阿仙奴發言人在一份聲明中說道：“ 這是一個複雜的醫療狀況，我們請來了很多世界知名專家，並且希望他能早日回歸球隊。 ”

“ 我們還給了他一年的合同，並相信他能夠恢復健康。最終他回到了西班牙，阿仙奴的每個人都很高興看到這些，我們祝願他和他的家人在未來一切都好。 ”

比利連說艾馬利令阿仙奴煥然一新

比利連指阿仙奴在艾馬利及雲格的手下截然不同，好像變成一家新球會一樣。

雲格帶領阿仙奴22年，現在改由艾馬利執教，比利連說感受到很大衝擊。

比利連說：「我們有很多新職員加入，好像成為一家新球會。我們為離去的人傷心，感謝他們幫忙，但新人上場總會想有自己的印記存在。」(Goal.com)

Ex-Arsenal striker Aliadiere reveals his role in Guendouzi's summer arrival

"I knew when I first saw him that he had something special and that a lot of clubs would be after him," Aliadiere told Goal.

"I said to him that for his development Arsenal would definitely be the right place for him.

"You can go to big clubs and never get a chance but Arsenal always give a chance to their young players. I thought it’d be good for him."

"To be honest yes I have been surprised [that Guendouzi has started so many games]," said Aliadiere.

"When I saw him joining the club I didn’t expect him to start straight away, I thought it would take him a bit of time to adapt but he’s such a confident lad. When I was playing with him at Lorient you could see that, on top of having the talent, he’s just so confident in himself.

"It doesn’t matter who you are, what career you’ve had, he’s happy to be whatever and friends with everybody.

"He’s just a nice and happy guy to be around. I’m not surprised he’s getting on with everyone in the dressing room."

阿古路落選FIFPro最佳11人候選名單

【now.com體育】國際足球員協會周一公佈年度最佳11人的候選名單，阿古路、加里夫巴利、奧斯爾3位名將都落選。

國際足球員協會（FIFPro）這份55人候選名單，分門將、後衛、中場、前鋒4個部份。

在前鋒方面，基斯坦奴朗拿度、美斯2位球王都有入選，於今夏世界盃以6球贏得金靴獎的哈利卡尼亦有份，但阿古路、加里夫巴利、阿歷斯山齊士就令人意外地落選。

至於近年表現大受批評的中場奧斯爾，就未能入選。後衛一眾入選者都十分正路，如中堅沙治奧拉莫斯、華拉尼、基亞連尼等。門將有5名候選人，包括保方、迪基亞、泰拔高圖爾斯、基羅拿華斯、達史特根。

這55名候選人由FIFPro 25000名球員會長選出，最終擁有最高票數的1名門將、4名反衛、3名中場、3名前鋒，將會成為年度最佳11人，結果將於9月24日公佈。
